page.title: 05Leisure and Recreation
page.content: After completing the survey about leisure & recreation in Darwen,we found that a large majority of people used the leisure centre in Darwen,only a small percentage travelled outside the town to other centres.Darwen leisure centre seems to be used at least once a week on a regular basis for a variety of activities.By far the most common activity is swimming.Many of the people thought that the centre was a good one,though it could be made better by having a wider selection of activities,by opening longer,more flexible hours & by having better facilities.Most people enjoy doing some sporting activities in their leisure time,even though they don't have much leisure time to play with.Other activities people enjoy doing include,gardening,reading,D.I.Y .and visiting other places.
